title: getting the flags of an IDA name
content:
IDA has the following function 
idc.MakeNameEx
which accepts multiple 
flags
values that set properties about the given name (such as whether it's public, auto-generated, etc). So far all is good and well, but I would like to do the opposite - get those flag values of a name. I'd like to test if a name is public, weak, auto, etc. but I cant seem to find a 
idc.NameFlags
method anywhere. Am I missing something or is this functionality unavailable? Thanks
